Stranger Things fans are preparing for the final episodes of season 4, but Spotify is helping those would-be victims of Vecna.
Season 4 of Stranger Things has been a return to form for the show afte… [+1799 chars]

articles.author: Hayley Soen
articles.title: Netflix confirms huge Upside Down clue we all missed in Stranger Things 4 - The Tab
articles.description: Ok my mind is blown
articles.content: Netflix has pointed out a huge clue to the Upside Down that we all missed in Stranger Things 4, and it was staring us right in the face in the Rainbow Room. As we wait for volume two to drop, Netflix… [+1969 chars]
